func:
let spaceId = flow.get("spaceId")
let system_alarm_notices = await global.get("mysql_query")("select * from system_alarm_notice where spaceId = ? and (isNotice = 2 or isNotice = 3) limit 10000", [spaceId])
for (let i = 0; i < system_alarm_notices.length; i++){
    let d = system_alarm_notices[i]
    let userId = d.userId
    let userName = d.userName
    let alarmSourceId = d.id
    let type = d.type
    let typeName = d.typeName
    let deviceID = d.deviceID
    let deviceName = d.deviceName
    let deviceAddress = d.deviceAddress
    let deviceFullName = d.deviceFullName
    let alarmCode = d.alarmCode
    let alarmMsg = d.alarmMsg
    let baseUnit = d.baseUnit
    let baseValue = d.baseValue
    let realValue = d.realValue
    let createTime = d.createTime
    let isNotice = d.isNotice
    let noticeMsg = d.noticeMsg

    let values = [spaceId, alarmSourceId, userId, userName, type, typeName, deviceID, deviceName, deviceAddress, deviceFullName, alarmCode, alarmMsg, baseUnit, baseValue, realValue, createTime, isNotice, noticeMsg]
    await global.get("mysql_query")("insert into system_alarm_notice_log (spaceId, alarmSourceId, userId, userName, type, typeName, deviceID, deviceName, deviceAddress, deviceFullName, alarmCode, alarmMsg, baseUnit, baseValue, realValue, createTime, isNotice, noticeMsg) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)", values)

    await global.get("mysql_query")("delete from system_alarm_notice where id = ? limit 1", [d.id])
}
return msg;

name: 定时处理通行日志记录
清理数据
定时处理通行日志记录
获取当日策略日志数据到TD临时表
处理数据
处理数据
定时推送当日日志数据到TD
推送数据到TD
func:
let spaceCode = flow.get("spaceCode")
let iot_control_log_temps = await global.get("mysql_query")("select * from iot_control_log_temp where spaceCode = ? and flag = 0 limit 5000", [spaceCode])
for (let i = 0; i < iot_control_log_temps.length; i++) {
    let d = iot_control_log_temps[i]
    let sourceType = d.sourceType
    let sourceName = d.sourceName
    let userId = d.userId
    let userName = d.userName
    let userEmpNo = d.userEmpNo ? d.userEmpNo : ""
    let deviceType = d.deviceType
    let actionTopic = d.actionTopic
    let actionData = d.actionData
    let controlTime = d.controlTime

    let data = {}
    data.ts = parseInt(controlTime) * 1000 + parseInt(Math.random() * (999 - 100) + 100)
    data.space = d.spaceCode
    data.floor_area = d.floorAreaCode
    data.floor = d.floorCode
    data.area = d.areaCode
    data.source_type = sourceType
    data.source_name = sourceName
    data.user_id = userId
    data.user_emp_no = userEmpNo
    data.user_name = userName
    data.device_type = deviceType
    data.action_topic = actionTopic
    data.action_data = actionData

    let newMsg = {}
    newMsg.payload = data
    node.send(newMsg)

    await global.get("mysql_query")("update iot_control_log_temp set flag = 1 where id = ? limit 1", [d.id])
    await global.get("sleep")(100)
}
return msg;

构建批量插入SQL
房间灯光开启时长（能耗排名）
query:
SELECT 
    code,
    category,
    -- 核心逻辑：统计状态为 'on' 的记录数
    -- 假设你的 batch/mqtt 是 1分钟左右报一次，count 出来的数字就接近分钟数
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'on') AS active_records,
    -- 如果是 5秒一报，则计算时长为：
    ROUND(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'on') * 5 / 60.0, 1) AS estimated_active_minutes
FROM iot_device_status
WHERE category = 'light'
  AND ts >= CURRENT_DATE  -- 仅统计今天
GROUP BY code, category
ORDER BY active_records DESC;

name: 人体传感器：10分钟内“是否有人的状态”
query:
SELECT 
    code AS sensor_code,
    -- 核心逻辑：如果在过去 10 分钟内 status 为 'on' 的记录数 > 0，则判定为有人
    CASE 
        WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'on') > 0 THEN '有人'
        ELSE '无人'
    END AS presence_status,
    -- 记录最后一次检测到人的时间（便于管理人员追溯）
    MAX(ts) FILTER (WHERE status = 'on') AS last_occupied_at,
    -- 统计这 10 分钟内总共上报了多少次数据（用于判断传感器是否在线）
    COUNT(*) AS report_count
FROM iot_device_status
WHERE 
    category = 'humensensor'          -- 只筛选人体传感器
    AND ts > NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes' -- 只扫描最近 10 分钟的数据
GROUP BY code
ORDER BY presence_status DESC;

name: 24小时内有那些掉线2分钟以上的照明
query:
WITH sensor_gaps AS (
    SELECT 
        code,
        category,
        ts AS resume_time,                          -- 恢复正常的时间点
        lag(ts) OVER (PARTITION BY code ORDER BY ts) AS last_active_time, -- 断开前最后一次活跃时间
        ts - lag(ts) OVER (PARTITION BY code ORDER BY ts) AS gap_duration   -- 断连持续时长
    FROM iot_device_status
    WHERE 
        category = 'light'
        AND ts > now() - INTERVAL '24 hours'        -- 只查过去 24 小时
)
SELECT 
    code,
    last_active_time AS offline_start,              -- 离线开始时刻
    resume_time AS offline_end,                     -- 离线结束时刻（恢复上线）
    gap_duration AS duration                        -- 持续时长
FROM sensor_gaps
WHERE 
    gap_duration > INTERVAL '10 minutes'             -- 核心逻辑：找出所有超过 2 分钟的间隙
ORDER BY gap_duration DESC;

name: 哪个设备最“弱不禁风”，
query:
WITH sensor_gaps AS (
    SELECT 
        code,
        ts - lag(ts) OVER (PARTITION BY code ORDER BY ts) AS gap_duration
    FROM iot_device_status
    WHERE category = 'light' AND ts > now() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
)
SELECT 
    code,
    COUNT(*) AS failure_count,                       -- 过去 24 小时断连次数
    SUM(gap_duration) AS total_offline_time,         -- 总离线时长
    MAX(gap_duration) AS longest_failure             -- 最长一次断连时间
FROM sensor_gaps
WHERE gap_duration > INTERVAL '2 minutes'
GROUP BY code
ORDER BY total_offline_time DESC;

name: 今天每个小时的用电增量曲线
query:
SELECT 
    time_bucket('1 hour', ts) AS hour_slot,
    code,
    MAX((raw_status->>'total_kwh')::numeric) - MIN((raw_status->>'total_kwh')::numeric) AS hourly_usage
FROM iot_device_status
WHERE category = 'powersensor'
  AND ts > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
GROUP BY hour_slot, code
ORDER BY hour_slot DESC;

name: 发布每个设备状态信息
updateTime
suggest
pm25
wind
temperatureNum
humidityNum
浙江省杭州市萧山区市心北路
TD数据处理
func:
let w = msg.payload
if(w.temperatureNum != undefined){
    let data = {}
    data.ts = new Date().getTime()
    data.space = "HGH-WC"
    data.pm25 = parseInt(w.pm25)
    data.wind = parseFloat(w.wind)
    data.humidity = parseInt(w.humidityNum)
    data.temperature = parseFloat(w.temperatureNum)
    data.weather = w.today
    data.aiq = w.AIQ
    let newMsg = {}
    newMsg.payload = data
    node.send(newMsg)
}
